name: Lucy Heartfilia from Fairy Tail
description:
Made this for myself but might as well share it, i don't find it to flexible rn so i might release other version later. The fairy tail tatt is really hard to get with my dataset so don't expect that to show up

Rec Weight : 0.6-0.8

For realistic and semi realistic i suggest 0.8

Images were generated at 512x768

I also use Hires.fix for all the generated image

Not a very flexible model rn so for optimal result uses these trigger prompt

Trigger prompt for early season lucy: lucy1sokakaiju,1girl,large breasts,sleeveless,blue skirt,miniskirt

Trigger prompt for later season :lucy2sokakaiju,1girl,large breasts,detached sleeves,cleavage,navel,skirt,miniskirt,thighhighs,bare shoulders,crop top

For non-commercial use

Image trained using anime snapshot, my own amateursih manual drawing, some booru stuff, and manga colored pages. All credit goes to char creator Hiro Mashima

Can't guarantee you got the same result from my prompt, could be a different upscaler/vae or clip skip.

modelVersions.name: Later season
modelVersions.description: Prompt for later season : lucy2sokakaiju,1girl,large breasts,detached sleeves,cleavage,navel,skirt,miniskirt,thighhighs,bare shoulders,crop top,smile
